import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link as Link2 } from 'react-scroll'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Baseurl } from '../components/Baseurl.js'; import Savedcourses from './Savedcourses'; const Coursedetails = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) let {course} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { axios.post(`${Baseurl}coursedetails.php`, JSON.stringify(course) ).then(res => { if (res.status == 200) { let CourseResponse = res.data.CourseDetails; setCourseDetails(CourseResponse); // localStorage.setItem('courseId', JSON.stringify(CourseResponse.course_id)) } }) }, []) const saveCourse = () => { if (localStorage.Token) { alert('d') } else { alert('aa') } } const [courseDetails, setCourseDetails] = useState({}) const toggle = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
